name: Regency Global Technologies, Inc.
description: Regency Global Technologies, Inc. is a diversified technology company focused on developing innovative solutions for various industries including telecommunications, information technology, and energy management. Founded in 2008, Regency aims to enhance operational efficiencies and drive sustainable growth through cutting-edge technologies and strategic partnerships. The company specializes in providing advanced software products, project management services, and consulting solutions that help clients optimize their business processes. Regency's flagship products include systems for real-time data analytics, network optimization, and smart energy management, catering to both enterprise and governmental clients. With a commitment to innovation, Regency invests in research and development to stay ahead of industry trends and provide state-of-the-art solutions. The company is also dedicated to corporate social responsibility, promoting sustainability and environmental stewardship in all its operations. Regency Global Technologies is headquartered in Austin, Texas, and continues to expand its market presence both domestically and internationally, striving to deliver exceptional value to its stakeholders.

seo.meta_title: Regency Global Technologies, Inc. | Innovative Technology Solutions
seo.meta_description: Explore Regency Global Technologies, Inc., a leader in technology solutions for telecommunications and energy management. Discover our innovative products and commitment to sustainability.

faq.answer: James D. Taylor is the CEO of Regency Global Technologies, Inc.

faq.answer: Regency Global Technologies is headquartered in Austin, Texas, USA.

faq.answer: Regency's main products include real-time data analytics and network optimization tools.

faq.answer: Regency Global Technologies was founded in 2008.
